headline.main: $69,000 CONTRIBUTED FOR BRITISH CHILDREN; Jews of Interfaith Group Give Fund -- Stephen Wise Feted

lead_paragraph: A contribution of $69,000 to build nonsectarian nursing homes for children in Great Britain was presented to the British War Relief Society last night by the Jewish Section of the Interfaith Committee for Aid to the Democracies at a dinner in the Waldorf-Astoria honoring Dr. Stephen S. Wise, president of the American Jewish Congress.
abstract: aid to Brit and USSR urged by Rabbi S S Wise
